traits.Magic Resistance: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The armanite's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.Multiattack: The armanite makes three attacks: one with its hooves, one with its claws, and one with its serrated tail.
actions.Hooves: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.Serrated Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.Lightning Lance (Recharge 5\u20136): The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
